statements: UPDATE GreenBuildingAssessments SET total_impact_score = 90 WHERE assessment_id = 1
UPDATE GreenBuildingAssessments SET development_name = 'New Green Tower', assessment_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE assessment_id = 2
UPDATE GreenBuildingAssessments SET development_name = 'Central Park Towers', total_impact_score = 95 WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE GreenBuildingAssessments SET total_impact_score = 85, assessment_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE development_name = 'Eco Plaza' AND total_impact_score < 90;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET assessment_date = '2021-10-15', assessment_result = 'Positive' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE building_developments SET green_building_certification = 'LEED Platinum', development_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE building_name = 'Sky Tower';
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET location = 'New Location', assessment_result = 'Positive impact' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE building_developments SET developer_name = 'New Developer', green_building_certification = 'LEED Platinum' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE green_building_projects SET project_name = 'Eco-Friendly Residences' WHERE project_id = 101;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET assessment_result = 'Low impact on biodiversity' WHERE project_id = 101;

UPDATE green_building_projects SET project_name='Eco-Friendly Condo Renovation', location='City Center', start_date='2022-06-15', end_date='2023-01-30', project_description='Renovation with energy-efficient materials' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET assessment_date='2022-07-10', assessed_by='Environmental Consulting Firm A', assessment_result='Low environmental impact' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET assessors = 'John Doe', assessment_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE assessors SET certification_status = TRUE, contact_info = '555-1234' WHERE assessor_name = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessments SET project_name='Renewable Energy Project', site_location='Greenfield Site' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE building_developments SET completion_date='2023-08-15', address='123 Main Street' WHERE project_name='Commercial Complex';
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET location='New York', assessors='John Doe', assessment_report='Pending' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE green_building_development SET owner='ABC Company', start_date='2022-07-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE environmental_impact_assessment SET assessors='Team A', date='2023-01-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE green_building_development SET owner='Company XYZ', start_date='2022-12-01' WHERE id=2;
